channel.title: Car Scientist on David Wesst
channel.description: Recent content in Car Scientist on David Wesst

item.title: Jan 2020 Devlog
item.description: Did you know that I really try and make video games and not just talk about them? Me neither, but this video will fix all that! I tend to fall into the crutch of talking about technology rather than actually doing it. There is nothing wrong with the evangelism/marketing side of the tech community, but the whole point of me doing this is to share my journey and the tips along the way.
